content.raw: Have we considered adding a name library to Gazebo?  I'm thinking of something that would abstract these `::` string manipulations, akin to [boost::filesystem::path](http://www.boost.org/doc/libs/1_53_0/libs/filesystem/doc/reference.html#class-path).
content.html: Have we considered adding a name library to Gazebo? I'm thinking of something that would abstract these :: string manipulations, akin to boost::filesystem::path.
